title: How to Pronounce RARE - American English Pronunciation Lesson

json.text:
hi this is Jennifer from Tarle speech
with your pronunciation question today's

question is how do I pronounce the word
rare and rare means not occurring very

often it is spelled R a R E it is
pronounced R with the movement vowel air

so I think a lot of people don't know
how to pronounce this word because of

the spelling to say this word correctly
start with the R sound

and then move to air by opening your
mouth wide and then rounding your lips

slightly rare rare rare the rare
painting is very expensive give it a try

I know people are going to notice the
difference if you found this video

helpful share it with a friend and give
us a like don't forget to subscribe and

if you have any questions leave them in
the comment section or visit us at Tarle
Speech dot com thanks so much
